properties.address: Cold Nose, Bagley, Nr Wedmore, Somerset BS28 4TG
properties.description: A welcoming place for the whole community and also for regular Christian worship. Free tea/coffee, homemade cakes & a wonderful view.
properties.title: Bagley Baptist Church

properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Cheddar Library

properties.address: Elim Connect Centre, Wells, Somerset BA5 2BE
properties.description: Connect is a Day Centre that provides a number of Drop Ins during the week for those that need a warm space. We have a shower and postal service that can be accessed during our Community Drop-in hours. We run activities and services especially for those who find themselves homeless.
properties.title: Connect Community Church

properties.description: A warm space where all are welcome. Join in with activities or just chat over a cuppa.
properties.title: RenewPBC

properties.address: Shepton Mallet Library, Shepton Mallett, Somerset BA4 5AZ
properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Our Winter Coat Exchange runs from October – March. You can donate coats, or simply take one for free if you need it. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning, iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
properties.title: Shepton Mallet Library
